snippet: Everyone along the Turkish-Syrian border, it seems, either wants in on the action or just wants it all to go away.
abstract: Kilis Journal; Syrian civil war has become defining feature of life along Turkish-Syrian border, as can be seen in Turkish border city of Kilis; Syrians are trying to change their lives, Turks are trying to hold on to theirs, and both are struggling to coexist.
lead_paragraph: Everyone along the Turkish-Syrian border, it seems, either wants in on the action or just wants it all to go away.

headline.seo: Along Syrian Border, Lives Defined by War
headline.main: Along Syrian Border, Lives Defined by War
headline.print_headline: Along Syrian Border, Lives Defined by War
